Definition at line 318 of file Dispatch.php.

emailExceptions ( $  flag = null,
$  emailAddress = 'nobody' 
)

Sets the emailExceptions flag and retreives the current status.

By default, exceptions are caught by the ASO_Dispatch class. Enabling this flag will additionally email them to an administrator (or whoever's email is passed in as the 2nd parameter).

Parameters:
boolean $flag
Returns:
void

Definition at line 188 of file Dispatch.php.

Referenced by run().

logExceptions ( $  flag = null  ) 

Sets the logExceptions flag and retreives the current status.

By default, exceptions are caught by the ASO_Dispatch class. Enabling this flag will additionally log them to a file defined by $CONFIG['exception_log'] (in app/Config.php).

Parameters:
boolean $flag
Returns:
void

Definition at line 167 of file Dispatch.php.

Referenced by run().

Starts execution of the ASOworx framework.

Exceptions:
ASO_Exception 
Returns:
void

Definition at line 205 of file Dispatch.php.

throwExceptions ( $  flag = null  ) 

Sets the throwExceptions flag and retreives the current status.

By default, exceptions are caught by the ASO_Dispatch class. Enabling this flag will allow them to pass back to the caller.

Parameters:
boolean $flag
Returns:
void
